name: Incompatible Species Episode 3: Reflection Rejection, Rejection Reflection
name_original: Incompatible Species Episode 3: Reflection Rejection, Rejection Reflection
description:
Tensions between Chris and Lucius reach a boiling point as the group prepares to meet with Margaretta Hemsworth. Can they at least start to tolerate each other when things get rough, or will they tear each other apart?

This is a standalone release for the third episode of Incompatible Species: Rejection Reflection, Reflection Rejection. You can find the full compilation of releases up to now here: https://poxnixles.itch.io/incomspe
